attributes.action: Re-open walk in centre in Sparkbrook, Sparkhill, Moseley & Kingsheath.
attributes.additional_details:
Not having a walk in centre and walking distance completely contradicts the phenomenon of a "walk in centre".

Do bear in mind the definition of a walk in centre, when taking this petition into consideration. 

(http://www.nhs.uk/nhsengland/aboutnhsservices/emergencyandurgentcareservices/pages/walk-incentressummary.aspx)
attributes.background: With a population of approximately 80,000 people having to travel by means of either public transport or private transport to and from walk in centre, really causes delays in residents being treated or diagnosed for much smaller illnesses or health related issues.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.

The walk-in centre is the responsibility of NHS Birmingham South Central clinical commissioning group.

You can find out how to contact the NHS Birmingham South Central CCG here:

https://bhamsouthcentralccg.nhs.uk/contact-us
